title: Spintires HotFix 19.06.2014 -  Multiplayer Working
description:
First Spintires Update


 After reviewing and monitoring the issues reported, we are pleased to announce that a Hotfix is now available.This update fixes the following issue(s): 

- Vehicle wheels becoming stuck under the map (described here http://www.oovee.co.uk/forum/topic/5963-wheels-can-stuck-under-the-map/) 


Instructions

-Extract the SST exe file into the Spintires game folders
- Move the appmanifest file to the program files/steam/steamapp (You should see otherr manifest files from other steam games you have installed.


How to get multiplayer working with this new update:

-Download SPINTIRES.V1.0.Hotfix.Steamworks.Fix-RVTFiX file

-Extract the content in the game folder

-Multiplayer should work now

link to download steamworks hotfix file <a href=" http://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=64696&p=925498#p925498" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=64696&p=925498#p925498</a>


Note: When entering a lobby make sure the other players is running the same version as you or you will disconnect from game lobby while everyone else goes in or crashes.


Check that forum thread to  stay up-to-date to enjoy the new content and play online with others.
